tool_description:
Price alerts/notifications REST API for custom price and symbols triggers in the following categories:
Crypto
Forex
Commodities
Stocks
name: Price Alerts
title: Price Alerts

api_list.name: getWellKnownStats
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://price-alerts1.p.rapidapi.com/api/getWellKnownStats"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "price-alerts1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://price-alerts1.p.rapidapi.com/api/getWellKnownStats"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "price-alerts1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
